name: Laser Defense Extreme
description:
Laser Defense Extreme is a Tower Defense Game, with a Killstreak System.
Place your "Towers" strategically and eliminate the incoming enemies.

Set up for EXTREME Killstreaks to get more Coins, or just build a bunch of 3D Printers to print Coins that way :)
Make your own Bullet Hell or just Upgrade a few towers to the max, whatever Strategy you prefer!

Key features:


- 21 Playable Maps which includes 1 SECRET Map
- 18 Deployable Towers/Tools to Play and Experiment with

WARNING:
This game contains flashing lights and images.
